regen.absent_element: logging of performance metrics and compute error statistics
regen.new_specification: The BE shall log all monitored performance metrics and compute error statistics for audit and analysis purposes.

regen.absent_element: real-time alerts or notifications to stakeholders when performance issues are detected
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide real-time alerts to stakeholders whenever performance metrics exceed defined tolerance levels.

regen.absent_element: threshold definition for tolerances in I/O Performance
regen.new_specification: The system shall define and validate tolerance thresholds for data transfer rates before monitoring I/O Performance.

label: Report all out of tolerance conditions when monitoring Compute Errors.
absence: action of reporting when monitoring Compute Errors
